itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by “Are You Garbage” podcast host Kevin Ryan to talk about what New York is like after getting slammed by COVID, doing comedy in front of PC crowds in NYC, going to illegal mafia casinos in Ohio, Kobe Bryant’s childhood basketball hoop selling for $37K, and who the most garbage person of all time is.

 

Go to ghostbed.com/drinkinbros and use code DRINKINBROS for 30% off EVERYTHING (Mattresses, Adjustable Base, and more) -- plus a 101 Night Sleep Trial and Mattresses Made in the USA!

Go to Babbel.com and use promo code DRINKINBROS for an extra 3 months free.
